        public void execute()
             throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception

      • examineCommandLineOptions

        private void examineCommandLineOptions()
        Find the command line arguments. Command line arguments are:
        • -h or --help
        • -v or --version
        • everything else is treated as file name argument

      • showHelpMessage

        void showHelpMessage()
        Prints help and usage information on STDOUT.

        public void setProcessor(ReportProcessor processor)
        Injection point for report processor.
        Parameters:
        processor - must not be null

      • getProcessor

        public ReportProcessor getProcessor()
        Get report processor.
        Returns:
        never null

      • processReport

        private void processReport(String reportFile)
        Processes a single report file. Exits the application with exit code != ExitCodeImpl.OK, if SAXException or IOException was thrown.
        Parameters:
        reportFile - file name of Checkstyle report

      • generateSuppression

        Generate suppressions configuration from report.
        Parameters:
        report - must not be null
        Returns:
        never null
